attributes.review: Today I went to download this amazing app and not only did it take many hours to download of amazing wifi, it also sent out a bunch of rapist, racist racist cockroaches out of my phone and basically caused a whole racial and political crack in my home life. My plan is to pursue a lawsuit against this company for everything ❤️ #AllPresidentsDie
attributes.title: Please listen to this ❤️

attributes.review: Keeping it 💯💯this app gave me corona and almost got deported 😭. So I opened the app while I was walking my fish and this sound started playing. Roaches and rats started coming and were dragging me all the way to ICE😱😱. Then  when I was trying to delete the app I saw the chetto guy🤯🤯.He told me not to wear a mask and I got corona✨🧚‍♀️. He also ate my fish 😪😪. Anyways Trump 2020✨🌿🦋on a grave stone💫✨🧚‍♀️.
attributes.title: almost got deported 🙀🙀

attributes.review: It took 10 seconds to download all there reviews need to be taken down they are fake
attributes.title: Download

attributes.review: Horrible experience! I downloaded the app and I immediately got a notification from my phone detecting a virus. Ever since then I have so many problems, all of my memory was removed including pictures, videos, contacts, texts, etc... I complained and was told the only way to get it all back was to vote for Trump.
attributes.title: WORST app ever

attributes.review: the app loaded to a blank screen.  then after that it kept shutting my phone down.  seems like a government conspiracy to me.  i just want to show my love for America and the president.  feel like Obama would have done a better job not gonna lie.  overall the app was a waste of a download, it took 4 hours to download.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is absolutely garbage. I could go on forever talking about why it’s such a waste of time to ever even think about downloading this. The only reason I re-downloaded it was to rate it 1 star. In fact, I feel like 1 star is too good of a rating for this garbage. Is there any way I can rate this trash app 0? It’s just that bad.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Got this app 276 day ago and finally it downloaded. When I open it up I started hearing wired noises like ✨🧚🏻‍♀️four🧚🏻‍♀️in🧚🏻‍♀️her🧚🏻‍♀️✨. My phone exploded 👁👄👁 and burned down my house like bruh am homeless now am writing this review from a phone both 🤖. 0-0 well that I got to say unless you want to become homeless I would recommend this app then👩🏼‍🦯.
attributes.title: 🚨DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE HOMELESS🚨

attributes.review: This app took SOOO long to download and even when it finally did, it was super slow. Couldn’t open the app without it glitching every 5 seconds. All I wanted to do was show my support for this country I love so much. This has been the worst experience with an app I have ever been through
attributes.title: If I could do zero stars, I would.

attributes.review: ok first of all, this app took 69 hours to download, WHICH IS OUTRAGEOUS and i’d like to speak to the manager. second of all, when you first open it, the app hacks your entire phone and sends it to the government to spy on yuu👁👅👁THIRDLY, the fbi agent who received my file found my phone number and messaged me to tell me my double chin isn’t pretty, so i’d like to file a complaint 🥰🧚🏻
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
Ever since downloading this app my life had been a living nightmare. I am Sailor Moon and since downloading this app Tuxedo Mask won’t respond to my calls and texts. Sailor Mars & Sailor Mercury have completely cut me off. My powers are diminishing and Luna ran away. I have no one to blame but Donald Trumps app. He has infiltrated my mind. Please beware of this evil man and app. 
Thank you.
attributes.title: The worse app of all apps, period!
